entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 9:14 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 54 km/h gust 76 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:40 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
